thread.title: Don Murphy - Golden Arm Media
thread.title_full: Greatmats reviewed by Don Murphy - Golden Arm Media

author: Don Murphy - Golden Arm Media
title: Don Murphy - Golden Arm Media
text: I was looking flooring to cover the concrete in our Austin video studio and called Greatmats. The service people helped educated me on the options and I ordered a 12 X 16 (193 tiles) floor. I installed it myself (so it must be easy!) and it still looks beautiful. We shoot videos on it almost daily now and get lots of compliments. I recommend Greatmats highly!
